snippet.title: Uncharted 3 Drake's Deception Explorer Edition Unboxing (UK Version)
snippet.description:
A look at the Uncharted 3 Drake's Deception Explorer Edition.

This is a different version to the one that's been released in the US. It comes in a treasure chest/travellers case as apposed to the box that the US one comes in, the catch on the box is functional however the leather straps on work via button catches. 

Box is very well made and beautifully decorated. A definate must for a collector.

Quite an amazing collectors edition for an amazing game.
